byline.contributor: Rick Gladstone reported from New York, and Thomas Erdbrink from Tehran.
byline.original: By RICK GLADSTONE and THOMAS ERDBRINK

abstract: Report by Iran's Fars News Agency suggests that imprisoned Washington Post correspondent Jason Rezaian is Central Intelligence Agency spy and gives specifics about accusations made against him; publication of report may indicate that trial in imminent.
lead_paragraph: The Iranian news report was laden with innuendo and unattributed assertions about Jason Rezaian, a Washington Post correspondent jailed in Tehran since last year.

headline.main: New Report on Washington Post Writer Seen as Prelude to Espionage Trial
headline.print_headline: Spy Claim Against Reporter Hints Trial in Iran Is Near

snippet: The Iranian news report was laden with innuendo and unattributed assertions about Jason Rezaian, a Washington Post correspondent jailed in Tehran since last year.
